name: Shellbar
tagline: Run shell scripts from your status bar!
body:
# ðŸš Shellbar ðŸš Run shell scripts from your status bar! > sumdey sewn it wil tern into majikul >
> just u wayt ## Features: - [x] Showing hidden (dot) files in Finder - [x] Hiding hidden (dot) files in Finder - [x] Clearing all logs - [x] Emptying the trash - [ ] Running commands directly from the status bar (instead of preset buttons) ### License This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
